private void download(String downloadurl) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		HttpUtils http = new HttpUtils();
		http.download(downloadurl, "/mnt/sdcard/xxx.apk", new RequestCallBack<File>() {
			
			@Override
			//下载成功
			public void onSuccess(ResponseInfo<File> arg0) {
				// TODO Auto-generated method stub
				System.out.println("下载成功");
				Intent intent = new Intent();
				intent.addCategory("android.intent.category.DEFAULT");
				intent.setAction("android.intent.action.VIEW");
				//intent.setData(Uri.fromFile(new File("/mnt/sdcard/xxx.apk")));
				//intent.setType("application/vnd.android.package-archive");
				intent.setDataAndType(Uri.fromFile(new File("/mnt/sdcard/xxx.apk")), "application/vnd.android.package-archive");
				
				
				
				startActivityForResult(intent, 0);
				
				
				
				/* <action android:name="android.intent.action.VIEW" />
	                <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" />
	                <data android:scheme="content" />
	                <data android:scheme="file" />
	                <data android:mimeType="application/vnd.android.package-archive" />*/
				
			}
			
			@Override
			//下载失败
			public void onFailure(HttpException arg0, String arg1) {
				// TODO Auto-generated method stub
				Toast.makeText(SplashActivity.this, "下载失败", 0).show();
				//返回主界面
				loadMainUI();
				
			}
			@Override
			//下载中
			public void onLoading(long total, long current, boolean isUploading) {
				// TODO Auto-generated method stub
				
				tv_splash_info.setText(current+"/"+total);
				System.out.println("正在下载");
				super.onLoading(total, current, isUploading);
			}
		});
	
		
		
	}
